title: Champ Select Chat simply does not work for me
body:
For over a week now, my chat in Champ Select and the one after a match ends, simply do not work. The chat during the premade-making has a very similar issue for me.

The first 2 cases don't let me both see what others type and (as I've asked people I queued with in-game) make so that anything I type also doesn't appear to others.
The premade chat makes it so I don't see what the premade-mates type, make it so I don't see the things I do say, but the people in the premade so see what I type.

I've already repaired my Beta Client and the issue still existed without any changes.

During the making of this post, I am downloading the Legacy Client once again. Will post an update after I find out if the issue will continue to persist there too.

Screenshots from Coop vs AI Champ Select matches:
http://imgur.com/AjDKfPj
http://imgur.com/nhZCmsJ

EDIT: The Update is here - the chat in the Legacy Client works exactly as it should, the issue exists only in the "Nearly-non-Beta" Client, goddammit Rito.

replies.body: Are you having any other chat issues outside of that?  There may be a corrupted file with the updated client that failing to get you connected to chat.  I'd suggest running a repair to make sure your data is installed properly and running smoothly.   The repair option is available through the patcher's gear icon, under the General tab.  Let me know how that goes!

I'm having no other chat issues outside of those I described. I can message friends as usual, the chat in-game works completely fine, etc.

As I've said, I already ran the Repair and it didn't change anything. Since yesterday I returned to the Legacy Client because all of the chat functions work as they ought to there, but I am afraid about what's going to happen once everyone is forced to use the new Client. I really hope I won't have that issue anymore by the time that happens.

Indeed, it's important to get this fixed up so you don't run into any issues once that time comes.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work with you individually on this.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to run some logs for more context.  It's important not to delay on this, so we'll get back to you!

So after over a week of my struggle I've managed to basically solve my problem myself, despite the people from the Support trying to help me in rather different ways.

As I just remembered today, on the day that my issue originally began, I (as sort of a joke) added some bot after a Coop vs AI match to my Friends List and blocked another one. So I thought to myself today that it very well might be connected with my issue somehow, considering that, as far as I remember, the option to block/add to friends a bot didn't even exist in the Legacy Client, so it might have been a unique to the Beta Client issue.

So I went to the list of blocked Summoners and managed to find a single icon without a name attached to it... So I removed it.
Next game I tried, the issue seemed as if it was completely gone and it most likely is.

Turns out that often times, some rather unexpected things can cause issues in (at least IMO) seemingly unconnected systems of a Client.

Well, thanks for help anyway, heh.
